title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1155.1 - Safe operation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1155.1 - Safe operation

State Regulations

No aircraft, watercraft or motor vehicle shall be operated in
a careless or negligent manner or in disregard of the rights and safety of
others, or without due caution and circumspection, or at a speed or in a manner
which endangers unreasonably persons or property or while the persons aboard
controlling any part of the operation thereof, is under the influence of
intoxicating liquor, or any narcotic or habit-forming drug, or if such
aircraft, watercraft or motor vehicle is so constructed, equipped or loaded as
to endanger unreasonably persons or property. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1155.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
